document_data.mainbody:
Quaruts were a variety of inevitable charged with preventing disruptions to the space-time continuum.
Quaruts were vaguely humanoid in shape, but their bodies were made of gears and pistons, with numerous small timepieces inside. The head was a continually flowing hourglass oddly, the sand inside a quaruts head sometimes flowed up instead of down. Quaruts "wore" fine half-plate armor covered in various symbols related to time.
In the World Tree cosmology, the inevitables were found in Dweomerheart, the realm of Mystra.
